alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson and eastern Leon Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tallahassee to 7 miles northeast of Florida A and M to 10 miles northeast of Woodville. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Alma, Ralford Greenway, Cody, Dills, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Lamont, Nash, Miccosukee, Thomas City, Drifton, Killearn Estates, Casa Blanco, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge and Forest Meadows Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
